goal.en: “This course is to understand the mechanism of volcanic eruption behavior and to predict the eruption of the volcano, as well as reduce the disasters caused by a volcanic eruption.“

outline.ch: “Review of Plate Tectonics; Physical/chemical properties of magmas; Anatomy of volcanoes and volcano types; Mechanics of volcanic eruptions and eruption types; Eruption products; Volcano hazards; Volcano monitoring/Volcano seismology; Study of historical eruptions (Santorini-Greece 1620 BC, Vesuvius-Italy 79 AD, Krakatau-Indonesia 1883 AD, Mt Pelee-Martinique 1902 AD, Mt St Helens-USA 1980 AD)“
outline.en: “Review of Plate Tectonics; Physical/chemical properties of magmas; Anatomy of volcanoes and volcano types; Mechanics of volcanic eruptions and eruption types; Eruption products; Volcano hazards; Volcano monitoring/Volcano seismology; Study of historical eruptions (Santorini-Greece 1620 BC, Vesuvius-Italy 79 AD, Krakatau-Indonesia 1883 AD, Mt Pelee-Martinique 1902 AD, Mt St Helens-USA 1980 AD)“
